summary: The Trickster God's reincarnation, now as a playable race in the form of an avatar
descriptionHtml:
Long ago did the ancient heart lay sullied, abused for the power of mortals, lashed with the will of a daedric prince, forgotten in the void of it's father. The last vestiges of strength within the mighty heart did birth forth a new avatar, a mortal that would wield the power of Shor to save the humans in their time of need.

What this mod is basically a modified port/recreation of a similar mod I found on the web a while back, this mods turns what was a simple follower mod into a fully playable race. 

Important Notes.

- Glitches from the original mod that I have nod been able to fix yet are as listed.

 - The body mesh includes an armor that will clip through most armor pieces, boots, gauntlets, helmets, jewelry, and rings are all fine.
 - The look of the race when loading initially in the race menu may glitch out, to fix this just select another race then come back and select the lorkhan race...this should reset the design back to the original.
author: KyleComments
